about_the_game:
Over Many Waters is an exciting Top-Down, Action-Adventure RPG set in 1500s Mesoamerica. In this fantasy indie game, play as Leo, a seafaring adventurer of Spanish and Aztec descent. Gather ancient and mystical weapons and items. Fight for Azuria and the Jaguar Princess to save a dying land from the evil Siyak, the Smoking Frog. Will you choose the fierce life of an Aztec warrior or the sea-hardy ways of the exploring Spaniard? Connect with your roots as a child of both worlds and determine your path in the new world.

Introducing “Over Many Waters” – a captivating Top-Down, Action-Adventure RPG that immerses you in the enchanting world of 1500s Mesoamerica. Embark on an exhilarating journey as Leo, a daring adventurer boasting a mixed heritage of Spanish and Aztec origins. Delve into the depths of this ancient realm, unearthing mystical artifacts and weapons that hold both history and power.

Traverse the Azurian Seas

Step into the shoes of Leo, the intrepid seafarer, and navigate through the rich tapestry of Azuria. Roaming the islands of the Azurian seas, Leo’s destiny intertwines with a looming threat of the Smoking Frog, Siyak. A harbinger of malevolence, Siyak seeks to plunge this fading land into darkness.

As you tread the path of Leo, you’ll face a pivotal choice. Embrace the fiery spirit of an Aztec warrior, guided by tradition and courage. Chart the course of a resilient Spanish explorer, seasoned by the relentless waves of the sea. Leo’s heart pulses with the blood of two worlds, presenting the power to forge his fate in this uncharted domain.

Within the realm of Azuria, the boundaries between reality and fantasy blur, inviting you into the mystique of Mesoamerican legends and lore. Leo unravels the tales of curses and secrets that loom over the Azurian sea. Keep a vigilant eye on our blog for a firsthand account of the unfolding saga.

Our journey doesn’t stop here. Embark alongside us as we document our indie game dev progress in a detailed game devlog, offering you an intimate glimpse into the creation of “Over Many Waters.” Anticipation builds as we set our sights on a playable demo slated for release by the close of 2023. Your unwavering support and invaluable feedback are the winds that steer our sails – thank you for being part of this remarkable odyssey.

short_description: Over Many Waters is an exciting Mesoamerican adventure of seafaring and exploration. Play as young Leo, a lost-at-sea Spanish explorer of Spanish and Aztec descent. Adventure the isles of the Azurian Sea, a series of ancient islands and waterways under threat of curse, war, piracy, and invasion.
